item.title: Yenni add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "<i>Ginny!</i>" said Mr. Weasley, flabbergasted. "Haven't I taught you <i>anything</i>? What have I always told you? Never trust anything that can think for itself <i>if you can't see where it keeps its brain</i>?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Yenni add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Yenni add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Write the kind of story you would like to read. People will give you all sorts of advice about writing, but if you are not writing something you like, no one else will like it either." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Yenni add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yenni add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "We don’t need a list of rights and wrongs, tables of dos and don’ts: we need books, time, and silence. <I>Thou shalt not</I> is soon forgotten, but <I>Once upon a time</I> lasts forever." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Yenni add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "I think it's perfectly possible to explain how the universe came about without bringing God into it, but I don't know everything, and there may well be a God somewhere, hiding away. Actually, if he is keeping out of sight, it's because he's ashamed of his followers and all the cruelty and ignorance they're responsible for promoting in his name. If I were him, I'd want nothing to do with them." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Yenni add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "I write almost always in the third person, and I don't think the narrator is male or female anyway. They're both, and young and old, and wise and silly, and sceptical and credulous, and innocent and experienced, all at once. Narrators are not even human - they're sprites." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Yenni add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Yenni add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Yenni add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Yenni add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Yenni add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Yenni add a quote by Anthony Horowitz
item.description: "The worst time to feel alone is when you're in a crowd." -- Anthony Horowitz
